full:
1 Lone Repo updates

  • UNCATEGORIZED - cognitivesdk


27 PR/issues updates
✔️ Done: 18
⚠️ WIP: 2
👀 Needs review: 7

HR

ws-problems - (woozyking)

OTHERS

  • ✔️ Issue #202 candidate/130444030 (c: woozyking, a: geoerika)


COMMON

chart-system - (vxsl, geoerika, DoParkEQ)

FIXED

  • 👀 PR #141 storybook - organize story groups in directories (vxsl)

CHANGED

  • ✔️ PR #140 Add chromatic workflow; update node versions in github workflows; fix lint warnings for React hook dep list in nivo charts (geoerika)
  • 👀 PR #138 d3/streamline graph (DoParkEQ)

lumen-labs - (kc-leung, sallkall, hyx131)

CHANGED

  • 👀 PR #27 text-field new input design changes & add textarea variant (kc-leung)
    • Issue #25 Components Library: new Input component
  • ✔️ PR #26 issue template - updated text formatting and new section for icons used (sallkall)
  • 👀 PR #24 switch, range-label & date-range components new color palette classname (kc-leung)
  • ✔️ PR #22 Buttons/colours (hyx131)
    • Issue #19 Components Library: updated buttons design
  • ✔️ PR #21 Chip component & variants (kc-leung)
    • Issue #15 Components Library: new chip design

ADDED

  • ✔️ PR #23 list - add list component + gridCols variant (hyx131)

common - (woozyking, vxsl)

ADDED

  • ✔️ PR #29 communications - revise principles and update list of tools in-use (woozyking)
  • ✔️ PR #28 git - added section re: migrating commits (vxsl)

python-curriculum - (woozyking)

ADDED

  • ⚠️ PR #31 15 - task queue (ft. NLP stuff again) (woozyking)


LOCUS

data-hub - (wwwmonsterlam)

CHANGED

  • ✔️ PR #44 remove - duplicate lint action and test action (wwwmonsterlam)

locussdk - (waynezhu6, maluhoss, woozyking, wenting-pan)

CHANGED

  • 👀 PR #116 Notebook Tests - add test dev dependencies (waynezhu6)
  • ✔️ PR #114 devops - separately copy package files, and explict __init__.py copy (woozyking)
  • ✔️ PR #110 devops - single-source __version__, and workflow revisions (woozyking)

ADDED

  • 👀 PR #115 Locussdk - add slack handler to remaining exposed methods (maluhoss)
  • ✔️ PR #112 Adding hyperopt and xgboost packages requested by OPTA (wenting-pan)
  • ✔️ PR #111 Adding hyperopt and xgboost packages requested by OPTA (wenting-pan)
  • ✔️ PR #109 dataset - route AOI cost computation to server-side API, deprecation cleanup (woozyking)
  • ⚠️ PR #108 geo - add create_geocohort function (woozyking)

FIXED

  • ✔️ PR #113 devops - fix version-check path (woozyking)

EnrichData - (maluhoss)

FIXED

  • 👀 PR #50 Convert Geoid - fix intersection error (maluhoss)

connector-gcs - (waynezhu6)

CHANGED

  • ✔️ PR #7 Airflow - upload to gcs as stream (waynezhu6)
  • ✔️ PR #6 Airflow - dynamic gs bucket upload (waynezhu6)


AUTOMATION

legion - (maluhoss)

FIXED

  • ✔️ PR #76 Release - fix error handling (maluhoss)



JOURNALS

Leo
Did:

  • python-curriculum/15 - pick apart the NLP portion as section 2, organize the main content for generic content parsing of websites (maybe count number of <a> tags, or pure text)
  • python-curriculum/15 - task queue illustration
  • python-curriculum/15 - bs4 parse and extract article title and other metadata
  • python-curriculum/15 - celery queue version, compare with single process, also list out components and job/task queue's architectural advantages
  • firstorder/hub - stub endpoint for mobile sdk payload POST (just respond with received or echo back the payload)
  • python-curriculum/15 - rq enqueue website fetching and extracting text
  • common - re-organize communications chapter and update principles and tools in-use
  • locussdk/devops - fix version check CI step and docker build
  • firstorder/middleware - fix validation on not OneOf cases
  • firstorder/dataset - verify include_req through string matching
  • hr - workable email correspondence/Q&A
  • python-curriculum/15 - train opinion-probability model (dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/clmentbisaillon/fake-and-real-news-dataset)
  • python-curriculum - 15 agenda layout: job queue, workers, pub/sub
  • hub - eval weatherbit dataset
  • locussdk/geo - create_geocohort to supply whitelabel and customer
  • locussdk/devops - fix version check in CI workflows
  • locussdk/devops - apply single-source versioning for locussdk.__version__
  • locussdk/devops - fix pipenv related actions/cache issue
  • hr - workable email correspondence and answer questions
  • locussdk/devops - github actions to enforce version release (like package.json checking) between locussdk.__version__ and tagged version
  • common/communication - revise with updates (migrate into notion)


Doing:

  • locussdk - groom through and work on open-sourcing, with pypi distribution
  • python-curriculum/15 - run the queue inside a flask app
  • builder - adapt popular times segments type with necessary changes
  • nn-viz - input visualizations
  • nn-viz - classification/regression visualizations
  • update/nlp - run baseline training corpus (prs/issues/dids/doings) against doc2vec/word2vec/lda models and compare performance, design shifting training window process
  • updates/nlp - incorporate with fasttext.js and dedupe actual runs
  • ws-problems/product - create sample solution for the backend track



Sally
Did:

  • design/lumen-labs - redesign selector/dropdown components (finished design in figma, zeplin & guide release on Monday)
  • design/lumen-labs - redesign the input component, deploy to zeplin and open issue
  • design - update modal with new design tokens and button styles (figma only - zeplin update will come after input box and selector components are redesigned)
  • design - update button components by new colour rules, create its official design guide
  • design - map out cases, variants and required attributes for each type of selector and dropdown components
  • lumen-labs - added templates for making new design-update issues


Doing:

  • design/locus-ql - update ql user flow diagram to include new builder and query results features
  • design - test new progress bar, tooltip, code block components in usage, graduate to Figma components library and publish to Zeplin
  • design/locus-ql - design drag and drop animation for column and filter selection
  • design/connection-hub - user flow diagram for creating new connections
  • design/connection-hub - user flow diagram for modifying and managing existing connections
  • design/locus-ql - add snackbar/toast popup after dataset save-selection
  • design/locus-ql - add indication of previously select dataset group in the selection modal
  • design/locus-ql - add remove dataset option on the builder homepage
  • design/locus-ql - update ql user flow map to include new builder features
  • design - test new progress bar, tooltip, code block components in usage, graduate to Figma components library and publish to Zeplin
  • design/locus-ql - update entire ql workbook with new colour scheme, prep for demo
  • design/locus-ql - design drag and drop animation for column and filter selection
  • design/locus-ql - determine cases for displaying query progress and implement design accordingly
  • design - update modal with new design tokens and button style



KrisC
Did:

  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - found MicrosoftBuildingFootprint dataset - used neural networks to build polygons for every single building in North America - dataset is free, we could use it for a number of projects I believe, as it's for literally every single building in north america, broken up by state, province, or territory
  • See attached for Repo, and paper:


Doing:

  • data_acquisition - satellite_imagery - three potential areas: building labeling, vehicle identification and land usage
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - Read up on other state of the art satellite image labeling solutions - SpaceNet Challenges - 7 of them with open repos, look really useful
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - build test model - want to be able to extract polygons the nn draws around the houses and buildings
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - be able to match the building polygons to user records (maybe use Solaris for the pipeline?)
  • satellite_imagery - vehicle identification - read up on state of the art - Preligens looks useful
  • satellite_imagery - vehicle identification - build test model
  • satellite_imagery - land usage - read up on state of the art semantic segmentation
  • satellite_imagery - land usage - build test model
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - see how we can use the building footprint data to match with user records





Kyle
Doing:

  • Finish widget-studio standalone storybook
  • Continue transitioning Locus to use URL params



Erika
Did:

  • poi-manage - create project page in notion
  • poi-manage - outline old & new create POI processes and present them to the team
  • firstorder - research and plan how to save created POIs based on coordinates
  • poi-manage - small adjustments on creating POIs by drawing #57
  • react-maps - investigate login comp issues with key_warden configs #85
  • ws - review https://github.com/EQWorks/ws-problems/issues/202
  • react-maps - cleanup and open for review [G2M] Add Login where needed in stories; add chromatic; rewrite stories in last Storybook syntax; upgrade storybook packages; clean up and reorganize files #85
  • react-maps/locus-map - add mapProps for Map comp props #82
  • chart-system - setup for chromatic #140 - https://www.chromatic.com/builds?appId=60f5a69eddb5b90039b6d17c
  • chart-system - fix lint warnings for react hook dep lists for nivo charts #140
  • chart-system - update github node version in all workflows #140
  • chart-system - review [G2M] added ratio adjuster #139
  • react-maps - add all env var to chromatic file and in the repo in github #85
  • react-maps/locus-map - add default geometryAccesor & story for Locus map #82


Doing:

  • react-maps/locus-map - implement onClick and onHover events #82
  • ql-ui/widget-studio - review Controller elements for final map widget that agree with Locus Map roadmap
  • poi-manage/firstorder - use geocoder to retrieve address/postalcode for POIs based on coordinates #57
  • firstorder - work on the query that retrieves the postal code with the largest overlap over a polygon



Catherine
Did:

  • Design system/colour - use guide
  • Design system/colour - polish colour with Tailwind Config
  • Design system/Button - status testing


Doing:

  • Connection hub - work flow chart
  • Design system/Tab - new tab component
  • Query Lab - saved and execution tab
  • Feedback form - Add questions in the Tyepfrom
  • POI management - POI page tab
  • logo - update logo's color after changing the design system
  • Query Lab - saved and execution tab
  • Feedback form - design
  • POI page tab
  • Tab - new tab component
  • Button - status testing



KC
Did:

  • Lumen-labs/switch - Change color palette usage & custom classes logic
  • Lumen-labs/slider - Change color palette usage & custom classes logic
  • Lumen-labs/chips - Add chips base components & variants


Doing:

  • Lumen-labs/textarea - add textarea for input



Selin
Did:

  • ql/re-layout - change browseViews column object to include query columns + query filters
  • ql/re-layout - render cartViews on parent left panel
  • ql/re-layout - link qeryColumn + queryFilter states from cartViews & browseViews
  • ql/re-layout - selectAll + reset handlers for cartViews

  • ql/re-layout - browse-views select toggle + select all + reset selection + save selection handlers
  • lumen-labs - release v0.1.0-alpha.3
  • ql/re-layout - display column type with chips
  • ql/re-layout - all views selectable columns component
  • ql/re-layout - all-views-modal content header
  • ql/re-layout - add tooltip component
  • ql/re-layout - fetch view columns + connect selectedView state to qlModel
  • ql/re-layout - view columns loading illustration + state
  • lumen-labs - add list base + styled components
  • ql/re-layout - all views list layout + connect list to qlModel
  • lumen-labs - button component refactor + update new colours


Doing:

  • ql/accordion - refactor Accordion component (max-height transition)
  • ql/components - refactor List component with react-window
  • [ql-todo]: Tooltip component overflow (all-views-modal views list top item)



Shari
Did:

  • snoke/conn-hub - refactoring - extracted getting sample config + POST connection out
  • snoke/conn-hub - refactoring code - extract validation out from handleNext
  • snoke/conn-hub - refactoring code - central error handling
  • snoke/conn-hub - modify + merge azure + refactor PR

  • snoke/conn-hub - multiple connections per set - better usage flow
  • snoke/conn-hub - connectors view details
